text: Faruk Rashid Chowdhury is a Jatiya Party politician from Bangladesh. Former Minister of State for Finance. He was elected a Member of the Parliament the Communist Party of Bangladesh for the 1987 first time from the Sunamganj-3 constituency. In 1988 the fourth parliamentary election form Jatiya Party, he was elected a second parliamentarian. == Birth and early life == Born in Sylhet, Bangladesh, Chowdhury is the younger brother of Humayun Rashid Chowdhury. == Political life == Faruk Rashid Chowdhury is a former leader of the Communist Party of Bangladesh and former Minister of State for Finance. He was elected a Member of the Parliament the Communist Party of Bangladesh for the 1987 first time from the Sunamganj-3 constituency. In 1988 the fourth parliamentary election for the Jatiya Party, he was elected a second parliamentarian. Later he joined the Jatiya Party.
